attributes.action: Introduce a public board to regulate politicians and policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public regulation is the only way to stop other polititions or Lords coming in to self regulate the houses.  I propose a randomly selected public body to be created annually/quarterly (like jury service) to oversee policies within government and introduce a 'Common Sense' factor.  The public bodies decisions could not be overturned.  Power is therfore given back to the people.
